entries.title_d: Intelligence shows that a Cloak agent will be picking up leaked CorSec information in the Corellia system. CorSec command wants you to destroy the agent and intercept the drop-off.
entries.title: Corellia System: Destroy the Cloak Agent
entries.split_quest_alert: Phase one complete. Begin mission phase two.
entries.quest_target_d: You must destroy the Cloak agent before he realizes that we are hunting him and leaves the system.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Corellia system. Once there, CorSec command will identify the Cloak agent and send you coordinates to his location via a navigation waypoint.
entries.quest_escort_d: There must be no suvivors to report back about what we are doing. You must also eliminate any escort that is traveling with the Cloak agent.
entries.failed_escape: That's no good, pilot. The agent found us out and called off the delivery. Come back to the station for debriefing.
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  Secondary target destroyed. Escort wing eliminated.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  Secondary target destroyed. %DI escort ship(s) remaining.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.destroy_escort: Good work, pilot. Primary target destroyed. Now eliminate the escort wing.
entries.assassinate_success: Copy that. Destruction of primary and secondary targets confirmed.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Cloak vessel found. Intercept and destroy the agent and his escort.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Deep scanning for Cloak agent signature. Stand by for coordinates.
